p: The potentiation of the antibacterial effect by combining EOs in binary preparations is also reflected in the antibacterial effect exerted in the case of E(OEO/BEO) emulsions. If in the monocomponent variant EOEO and EBEO did not inhibit the micellar development of P. aeruginosa and E. coli, applied in binary formula proved to be effective, but the effect is lower compared to the positive control.
